Job Description: Job Description     Creating a positive Brand Image / awareness of website/portal.     Candidate has to meet Client (Direct / Appointment) for website/portal and brief them the benefit of the website/portal.     Explains advantages and features of website/portal.     Answer customer s questions pertaining to service being offered.     Work Experience     Fresher/Experience     Skills     Excellent in concept selling presentation     Listening to what customer is saying and asking questions as appropriate     Good communication and handling the customer query     Work under pressure     Skill to convince customer with live example     Prior Experience in healthcare would be an added advantage     Education     Any Graduate / Under Graduate Non Technical Only
